SEARCH
Package com.datastax.astra.client.admin

Class AstraDBAdmin

java.lang.Object
com.datastax.astra.client.admin.AstraDBAdmin
public class AstraDBAdmin extends Object
Main Client for AstraDB, it implements administration and Data Api Operations.

    • createDatabase

      public UUID createDatabase(String name)
      Create new database with a name on free tier. The database name should not exist in the tenant.
      Parameters:
      name - database name
      Returns:
      database identifier

    • createDatabase

      public UUID createDatabase(String name, com.dtsx.astra.sdk.db.domain.CloudProviderType cloud, String cloudRegion, boolean waitForDb)
      Create new database with a name on the specified cloud provider and region. If the database with same name already exists it will be resumed if not active. The method will wait for the database to be active.
      Parameters:
      name - database name
      cloud - cloud provider
      cloudRegion - cloud region
      waitForDb - if set to true, the method is blocking
      Returns:
      database identifier

    • createDatabase

      public UUID createDatabase(String name, com.dtsx.astra.sdk.db.domain.CloudProviderType cloud, String cloudRegion)
      Create new database with a name on the specified cloud provider and region. If the database with same name already exists it will be resumed if not active. The method will wait for the database to be active.
      Parameters:
      name - database name
      cloud - cloud provider
      cloudRegion - cloud region
      Returns:
      database identifier
